page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT - VIDEOS
page.content:
The kind of video films you buy or hire now are mostly comedies, thrillers and science fiction. There are not many films for children. Most of the childrens' films they sell are cartoons and Walt Disney films.
(THE PHILADELPHIA EXPERIMENT) This is about an army that is trying to make Submarines disappear. The first test worked but the second one went drastically wrong and two young men were sent forward 40 years in time from 1945 to 1985 (our present year). They saw things they had never seen before. BEDMINSTER DOWN JUNIOR SCHOOL.
